Package model

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Database
  • final class Database
extends Object
    class to connect with Oracle database and perform operations like add and search

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean IS_CONNECTED
      constant is true if connection with Oracle database was successful
      private Statement statement
      used for executing statements like INSERT,CREATE and SELECT
      private @NotNull String TABLE_NAME
      constant having name of table in database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Database()
      constructor try to connect with Oracle database and if connection is successful, creates new table also performing cleaning data in this table
